name: Regulars
description:
Hello and welcome. This is an entry for ViNoWriMo 2020!

As a personal challenge to myself to create a game and finally participate in a Nanowrimo, I created a kinetic novel featuring Charis, a barista, and their encounters with 4 different individuals. There is a whopping 43k word count in here.

The mechanic is simple: choose an item off the menu and enjoy the read!

There is mature content in this game, such as: violence, sexual and foul language and other potentially sensitive topics!

Note: There will be no unlockable image gallery. However, I will consider releasing all the art sometime in the future!

Other Note: This is not play tested for Mac nor is it fully play tested / edited in general, so bugs may occur.
